li.p: You have integrated DITA-SEMIA in DITA-OT (see ).

context.p: DITA-SEMIA comes with two Oxygen frameworks: one for topics and one for maps. These frameworks are extensions of Oxygen's standard DITA frameworks. To make these available you have to add the dita-ot/plugin/org.dita-semia.resolver folder to the custom locations for frameworks:

step.cmd: In oXygen editor, open Options Preferences .
In the menu on the left, double-click Document Type Association and then click Locations.
Under Additional frameworks directories, click on Add.
